description:
# View Stock Ledger
The [**Stock Ledger**](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/user/manual/en/stock/stock-ledger) is a detailed record that keeps track of stock movements for a company. 

In this step we will view the *Stock Ledger*.
name: View Stock Ledger
report_description: You can set the filters to see entries specific to the previous steps.
title: View Stock Ledger
